branchCategory.name: C(L)KQG/CLKQP/CLKU
branchCategory.description: SMC's pin clamp cylinder series C(L)KQG/P was designed with 4 body types for a broad range of installation conditions.  There are 55 types of guide pins available and an optional locking mechanism.  C(L)KQG/P series  has positioning and clamping at one time!  Precision adjustment of clamping height is possible by choosing the with-shim type.  Adjustment range: 0.5 to 3mm.
